医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示受伤青少年物质使用筛查存在偏差加州大学洛杉矶分校和洛杉矶儿童医院的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，即使考虑到受伤​​的严重程度，在儿科创伤中心接受治疗的边缘群体受伤青少年也比白人青少年更有可能接受药物和酒精检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-bias-in-substance-use-screening-for-injured-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Study-reveals-bias-in-substance-use-screening-for-injured-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42bda95b-bbbf-447e-80de-cfc01e3e7910 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 23:25:00 -0400 Study reveals bias in substance use screening for injured adolescents
研究显示，注射吸毒的女性容易患心内膜炎注射吸毒者死于心内膜炎的速度惊人，心内膜炎是一种严重但可治疗的心脏瓣膜感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Women-who-inject-drugs-are-vulnerable-to-endocarditis-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Women-who-inject-drugs-are-vulnerable-to-endocarditis-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3325485e-11df-4804-bb2e-20c6b7471026 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 22:49:17 -0400 Women who inject drugs are vulnerable to endocarditis, study shows
全球专家齐聚布里斯班，召开专门研究流感的科学会议超过 1,400 名专家访问布里斯班，参加世界上唯一专门针对流感的科学会议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Global-experts-gather-in-Brisbane-for-scientific-meeting-dedicated-to-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Global-experts-gather-in-Brisbane-for-scientific-meeting-dedicated-to-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8b6fa21-c189-4828-82e7-0e3e8c270d1e Fri, 04 Oct 2024 22:26:47 -0400 Global experts gather in Brisbane for scientific meeting dedicated to influenza
探索海洋甲壳类动物的毒性潜力以用于药物开发许多动物使用毒液进行自卫或狩猎。这种毒液的成分被称为毒素，会干扰各种生理过程 - 这也是它们对新药理学制剂的开发如此有趣的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Exploring-the-venomous-potial-of-marine-crustaceans-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Exploring-the-venomous-potial-of-marine-crustaceans-for-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9190dc67-0c83-4ab5-bd3c-cbd59700159e Fri, 04 Oct 2024 22:22:00 -0400 Exploring the venomous potential of marine crustaceans for drug development
人工智能通过眼组学进行心血管风险评估彻底改变了眼科《亚太眼科杂志》最近发表的一篇立场论文探讨了人工智能 (AI) 在眼科领域的变革潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/AI-revolutionizes-oathmology-with-oculomics-for-cardioangio-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/AI-revolutionizes-oathmology-with-oculomics-for-cardioangio-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75cbb8ea-5d8f-49b2-8d05-267bf82b93ae Fri, 04 Oct 2024 22:13:41 -0400 AI revolutionizes ophthalmology with oculomics for cardiovascular risk assessment
新药可以延长乳腺癌患者的生命慕尼黑大学的研究人员成功测试了一种新药，可以显着延长乳腺癌患者的生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-drug-could-extend-the-lives-of-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-drug-could-extend-the-lives-of-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48d53406-dd70-46dd-96af-25dfbbfd96d8 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 22:02:00 -0400 New drug could extend the lives of breast cancer patients
工程大肠杆菌在癌症免疫治疗中显示出前景最近的研究表明，某些形式的大肠杆菌倾向于在身体的缺氧区域（包括肿瘤）定植，这表明它们可能在癌症治疗中发挥作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Engineered-E-coli-shows-promise-in-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Engineered-E-coli-shows-promise-in-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f47cf44-2ec9-4567-abba-65829653b9af Fri, 04 Oct 2024 21:54:00 -0400 Engineered E. coli shows promise in cancer immunotherapy
KitNewCare 发起活动，促进可持续肾脏护理的协作创新2024 年 10 月 16 日，KitNewCare 将举办创新挑战赛，该活动旨在促进协作创新，以实现肾脏护理的可持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/KitNewCare-launches-event-to-foster-collaborative-innovation-towards-sustainable-kidney-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/KitNewCare-launches-event-to-foster-collaborative-innovation-towards-sustainable-kidney-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d232316-b5fd-4206-9773-709142ce4366 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 21:46:07 -0400 KitNewCare launches event to foster collaborative innovation towards sustainable kidney care
合作研究调查帕金森病神经精神症状的根本原因帕金森病以其与运动相关的症状而闻名：震颤、僵硬、行动迟缓和跌倒，这是由大脑中产生多巴胺的神经元丧失引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Collaborative-study-investigates-underlying-cause-of-neuropsychiatric-symptoms-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/Collaborative-study-investigates-underlying-cause-of-neuropsychiatric-symptoms-in-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b1d6453-65a3-4599-9ce8-c144261fe866 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 21:43:04 -0400 Collaborative study investigates underlying cause of neuropsychiatric symptoms in Parkinson's disease
新分析引发了对退伍军人医疗保险优惠支出的担忧从 2011 年到 2020 年，退伍军人健康管理局花费了 780 亿美元来照顾参加 Medicare Advantage 计划的美国退伍军人，这引发了人们对联邦向这些私人计划过度支付的质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-analysis-raises-concerns-over-Medicare-Advantage-spending-for-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241004/New-analysis-raises-concerns-over-Medicare-Advantage-spending-for-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4d91441-533f-489c-8bed-8c0407823db3 Fri, 04 Oct 2024 21:32:37 -0400 New analysis raises concerns over Medicare Advantage spending for veterans
